meanings.definition: The act of pushing or pulling a trolley.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed trolleying her groceries around the store.
meanings.sent2: The workers were trolleying heavy boxes in the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a race trolleying their toys in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The trolleying of luggage through the airport was like a parade.
meanings.sent5: The sound of trolleying echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.definition: The use of a trolley for transporting goods.
meanings.sent1: Supermarkets rely on trolleying for customers to carry their purchases.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse manager organized the trolleying of supplies efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The trolleying of snacks at the party made it easy for guests to grab what they wanted.
meanings.sent4: The trolleying of tools in the workshop was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The smooth trolleying of goods along the conveyor belt impressed the onlookers.

meanings.definition: The movement of a trolley along a track.
meanings.sent1: The trolleying of the tram along the track was smooth and quiet.
meanings.sent2: The children watched in awe as the trolleying train passed by.
meanings.sent3: The trolleying of the rollercoaster cart thrilled the riders.
meanings.sent4: The trolleying of the luggage cart seemed effortless on the airport runway.
meanings.sent5: The trolleying of the shopping cart down the aisle was a familiar sound in the supermarket.

meanings.definition: The act of riding on a trolley for transportation.
meanings.sent1: The tourists enjoyed trolleying through the city to see the sights.
meanings.sent2: She felt the breeze on her face while trolleying on the open-air tram.
meanings.sent3: The trolleying of the sightseeing tram made the tour fun and informative.
meanings.sent4: Trolleying on the historic streetcar felt like traveling back in time.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic trolleying of the cable car added charm to the urban landscape.
